[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esengine/ecs-framework](./ecs-framework.md) &gt; [EventBus](./ecs-framework.eventbus.md)

## EventBus class

增强的事件总线实现 基于TypeSafeEventSystem，提供类型安全的事件发布订阅机制

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class EventBus implements IEventBus 
```
**Implements:** [IEventBus](./ecs-framework.ieventbus.md)
